thread.title: College football: 2-point attempt fails for Bluffton in 28-27 loss
thread.title_full: College football: 2-point attempt fails for Bluffton in 28-27 loss

author: The Courier
title: College football: 2-point attempt fails for Bluffton in 28-27 loss
text:
Comment: 0 
BLUFFTON — Bluffton quarterback Conner Sheehan’s two-point conversion pass attempt with 15 seconds left fell incomplete as the Beavers lost to Rose-Hulman 28-27 in a Heartland Collegiate Athletic Conference football game on Saturday. Sheehan connected with Raphael Dell for a 6-yard score to pull Bluffton within a point before the failed two-point conversion. Sheehan totaled 274 yards and two touchdowns on 20 of 33 passing, while Micah Roberson led the Beavers with 125 yards on 11 catches. Devante Thomas-Wright led the ground game with 91 yards and a touchdown on 21 carries as Bluffton fell to 2-3 overall, 1-2 in the HCAC. Rose-Hulman improved to 5-0, 3-0 HCAC. Rose-Hulman 14 7 7 0 — 28 Bluffton 7 7 0 13 — 27 First Quarter BLU — McLaurin 36 run (Watkins kick) RH — Dufauchard 2 run (Larew kick) RH — Dye 13 pass from Swenson (Larew kick) Second Quarter BLU — Thomas-Wright 1 run (Watkins kick) RH — Abbott 40 pass from Swenson (Larew kick) Third Quarter RH — Moehrle 11 pass from Swenson (Larew kick) Fourth Quarter BLU — McLaurin 10 pass from Sheehan (Watkins kick) BLU — Dell 6 pass from Sheehan (pass failed) MOUNT UNION 51 OHIO NORTHERN 7 ALLIANCE — Mount Union had its way with Ohio Northern on the ground on Saturday, totaling six rushing touchdowns with three different runners eclipsing the century mark as the Polar Bears fell 51-7 in an Ohio Athletic Conference football game. Logan Nemeth and Jamal Johnson each scored two touchdowns, while Nemeth (142), Bradley Mitchell (114) and Taurice Scott (106) each topped 100 rushing yards. Devon Price led Ohio Northern with 10 catches for 74 yards, while Will Freed completed 21 of 38 passes for 171 yards and one interception. The Polar Bears fell to 3-2 overall, 2-2 in the OAC. Mount Union improved to 5-0, 4-0 OAC. Ohio Northern 0 0 0 7 — 7 Mount Union 7 21 9 14 — 51 First Quarter MU — Mitchell 14 run (Antel kick) Second Quarter MU — Nemeth 1 run (Antel kick) MU — Scott 53 run (Antel kick) MU — Jones 38 interception return (Antel kick) Third Quarter MU — Nemeth 1 run (Antel kick) Fourth Quarter MU — Johnson 5 run (Antel kick) MU — Johnson 10 run (Antel kick) ONU — Magazine 1 run (DiMario kick)
